name: Nehemiah West
body:
## Summer Community Meeting Schedule

* July 16 (rain date - July 23)
* August 20 (rain date - August 27)
* September 17 (rain date - September 24)

Time: 10am

Location: common area - Nehemiah Way

## Important Documents

* [Bylaws of the Nehemiah West Homeowners Association](https://www.dropbox.com/s/snh1h8beigqbjrq/Bylaws.pdf?dl=0)
* [1995 Declarations of Rights, Covenants, Easements, and Restrictions](https://www.dropbox.com/s/e68aoarrkfxz65c/Declaration%20of%20Rights%2C%20etc..pdf?dl=0)

## Contact

* Chairman - Denise Thompson, 4512 Nehemiah Way
* Vice Chairman - Tracy McCoy, 4501 Mandela Way
* Treasurer - Michelle Washan, 4513 Mandela Way
* Secretary - Jeanette Hadley, 4510 Mandela Way
* Financial Secretary - Audrey Troutt, 12 Rudy Robinson Way

You can reach the board at nehemiah.west.neighborhood@gmail.com
